Articles.Content: You're back! Will you be updating it for 1.0.5 and making the kit even more awesome and part-friendly?

Not for 1.0.5, I'm waiting on 1.1 and see how that shakes things up.

I'm busy working on other cool stuff meanwhile, a new launch vehicle family. Here's a sneak peek:

Can I say again how awesome it is to have you back? And that is one smexy booster. It seems you are getting your KSP legs fully back...

 

Rune. It still amazes me that you managed to get the base to look that good without gizmos.

Hi all! I am fascinated with the topic and really want to check these vehicles in action.

But! The link  http://www./download/ff51vhul1uh2l7k/Modular_Base_Kit.zip  is strange looking and not downloadable. Could someone please provide the correct link, or share the original pack?

32 minutes ago, DmitriyLe said:

Hi all! I am fascinated with the topic and really want to check these vehicles in action.

But! The link  http://www./download/ff51vhul1uh2l7k/Modular_Base_Kit.zip  is strange looking and not downloadable. Could someone please provide the correct link, or share the original pack?

It is most likely broken mate. Contact @Temstar and see if he can help you out. Or.. look at pics and just rebuild the craft. Looking at them it would be easy. And much more satisfying to build yourself.

It's pretty old now, but if you want replace "www./download/" with "www.This website cannot be used on these forums/download"

It's a Squad thing. Supposedly people are seeing adult ads from mediafire, if you're offended by that sort of thing then you might want to avoid it. Personally I've never had any trouble with mediafire.

I'm waiting for 1.1 to retry the modular base thing. These bases take a lot of parts so the performance improvement from 1.1 is needed to make the most out of them.
Adding mediafire dot com to the link made sense, now I have the pack! Thanks for the answer

@Temstar, 1.1 is out, and these bases could be updated!

You could also replace the Kethane with Ore.

(Sorry for the micro-necro)
Remember chaps, suspension cannot be locked at the moment. May be better to wait for them to be fixed as I imagine it has broken surface docking bases in some way or another.
Is this Modular Base kit still compatible with the latest KSP?   How do I download the *.zip file?  The link in the original post from 2013 appears to be "stale" (no server found)?

On 7/23/2017 at 2:52 AM, JStevenson said:

Is this Modular Base kit still compatible with the latest KSP?   How do I download the *.zip file?  The link in the original post from 2013 appears to be "stale" (no server found)?

 

 

This is a damn old thread, that's why!

But @Majorjim!, if you have a file lying around I am sure many people would be happy to take this base out again.
This thread appears to be defunct. We can re-open it if OP contacts us.
